articles.content:
Cooperation between DPRK and Syria in news service
    Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- An agreement on exchange of news materials and cooperation between the Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) and the Syrian Arab News Agency was signed in Damascus on September 27.
   Present at the signing ceremony were the delegation of the KCNA, Syrian officials concerned and the Korean Ambassador to Syria.

New DPRK Minister of Culture appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Minister of Culture appointed
    Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Jae Hyon was relieved of the post of Minister of Culture of the DPRK and Kang Nung Su appointed to the post, according to a decree of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK dated September 3 .
